                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E9%94%90%E8%AF%84%23&amp;from=default">#人民锐评#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%81%B6%E6%84%8F%E8%90%A5%E9%94%80%E8%B4%A6%E5%8F%B7%E8%AF%A5%E5%85%B3%E5%81%9C%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#恶意营销账号该关停了#</a>】恶意营销账号的运营者，可要掂量掂量了。国家网信办将组织各地网信部门开展为期两个月的网络恶意营销账号专项整治行动。其背景是，一些恶意营销账号毫无敬畏，以“比烂”“比丑”心态招摇于世，引发公众强烈反感。<br>恶意营销账号可谓劣迹斑斑，此番被依法处理， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEVu5qeeV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497540936251269:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497540936251269&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BA%BD%E7%BA%A6%E5%B7%9E%E9%95%BF%E7%A7%B0%E8%AF%A5%E5%B7%9E%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E4%BB%8E%E6%AC%A7%E6%B4%B2%E4%BC%A0%E5%85%A5%23&amp;from=default">#纽约州长称该州病毒从欧洲传入#</a>】纽约州州长科莫24日说，调查显示，就纽约州而言，新冠病毒是从欧洲传入的，而不是中国。中国出现疫情后，美国发布针对中国的旅行禁令，针对欧洲的旅行禁令直到3月中旬才出台，“关上了前门却给病毒留下后门”。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BA%BD%E7%BA%A6%E5%B7%9E%E9%95%BF%E7%A7%B0%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E8%BF%9F%E7%BC%93%23&amp;from=default">#纽约州长称美国应对疫情迟缓#</a>，两个月时间里几乎无所 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEViJhplI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497533894149022:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497533894149022&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%99%95%E8%A5%BF%E9%80%9A%E6%8A%A57%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%AF%A6%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#陕西通报7例境外输入确诊详情#</a>】2020年4月24日8时至25日8时，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%99%95%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E7%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#陕西新增7例境外输入病例#</a>（其中1例为无症状感染者转为确诊病例）。当前隔离密切接触者160人。新增7例境外输入新冠肺炎确诊病例、1例无症状感染者，与4月21日、22日公布的23例境外输入确诊病例属同一航班人员，于4月19日乘坐CA910航班由 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEV8bCNvz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497527359246777:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497527359246777&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->

            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->

                                <a name="4497524510960484" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEV3B41RG?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 09:07" date="1587776866000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497524510960484:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 09:07</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【一起加油！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E5%90%AF%E5%8A%A8%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E5%90%88%E4%BD%9C%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE%E5%8A%A0%E5%BF%AB%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E7%A0%94%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#世卫组织启动国际合作项目加快疫苗研发#</a>】当地时间4月24日，世界卫生组织总干事谭德塞宣布，启动“获得抗击新冠肺炎工具加速器”国际合作倡议，加速新冠肺炎疫苗、诊断和治疗工具的研发、生产和公平分配。“只有团结一致，才能遏制疫情，确保科学和研究成果惠及每一个人。”（张朋辉） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEV3B41RG" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497524510960484:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497524510960484&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497516898296541" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEURjyOjb?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 08:37" date="1587775051000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497516898296541:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 08:37</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【一定要平安！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E5%B0%8F%E7%8F%A0%E5%B1%B1%E5%B1%B1%E7%81%AB%E5%8D%83%E4%BD%99%E4%BA%BA%E6%89%91%E6%95%91%23&amp;from=default">#青岛小珠山山火千余人扑救#</a>】4月23日下午，青岛小珠山发生山林火警，火情在得到控制后24日又发生复燃。截至24日24时，黄岛区小珠山山林火情已调动救火人员1600余名。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E5%B1%B1%E7%81%AB%E5%A4%8D%E7%87%83%E5%B1%85%E6%B0%91%E7%B4%A7%E6%80%A5%E6%92%A4%E7%A6%BB%23&amp;from=default">#青岛山火复燃居民紧急撤离#</a>，目前，专业救火人员正分别把控重要关口，全力扑救，暂无人员伤亡。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497516898296541:2017607-video:2017607%3A4497501894672386:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497516898296541:2803301701" title="北京日报都视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6welwvW" alt="http://t.cn/A6welwvW" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>北京日报都视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【华春莹发推：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%B7%B2%E5%90%91%E7%BE%8E%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E8%B6%8524%E4%BA%BF%E4%B8%AA%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#中国已向美提供超24亿个口罩#</a>，够每个美国人分7个】4月23日，外交部发言人华春莹发推特称：截至4月20日，中国已向美国提供了超过24.6亿个口罩，这意味着每个美国人能分到7个口罩。此外，（中国）还提供了近5000台呼吸机和很多其他设备。华春莹表示，“希望这能拯救更多生命”。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEUJbuhKe" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497511857218054:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497511857218054&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F1%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E4%B8%BA%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%AF%86%E5%88%87%E6%8E%A5%E8%A7%A6%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江1本土新增为病例密切接触者#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E9%80%9A%E6%8A%A51%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%AF%A6%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江通报1本土新增病例详情#</a>：2020年4月24日0-24时，黑龙江省省内新增确诊病例1例（哈尔滨），为在市二院确诊病例密切接触者。新增本土无症状感染者1例（哈尔滨），为市二院确诊病例的密切接触者，二者均是已纳入集中医学观察之中进一步排查出来的。截至4月2 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEUH7wdub" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497510577678339:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497510577678339&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        </div>

    </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497506404453390" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEUAoiGwS?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 07:55" date="1587772549000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497506404453390:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 07:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E11%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#昨日新增11例境外输入病例#</a>】4月24日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例12例，其中11例为境外输入病例，1例为本土病例（黑龙江1例）。境外输入现有确诊病例720例（含重症病例25例），现有疑似病例14例。累计确诊病例1629例，累计治愈出院病例909例，无死亡病例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%9329%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增无症状感染29例#</a>】4月24日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者29例，其中境外输入无症状感染者4例；当日转为确诊病例1例（境外输入1例）；当日解除医学观察24例（境外输入10例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者983例（境外输入150例）。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497505951372670" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEUzF5L5Q?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 07:54" date="1587772441000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497505951372670:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 07:54</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E12%E4%BE%8B%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增12例确诊病例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E1%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江新增1例本土病例#</a>】4月24日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例12例，其中11例为境外输入病例，1例为本土病例（黑龙江1例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例3例，其中2例为境外输入疑似病例，1例为本土疑似病例（北京1例）。<br>　 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEUzF5L5Q" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497505951372670:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497505951372670&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%B5%B7%E5%86%9B%E9%A9%B1%E9%80%90%E8%88%B0%E6%9A%B4%E5%8F%91%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#美国海军驱逐舰暴发疫情#</a>18人确诊】据美联社报道，正在执行缉毒任务的美国海军“基德号”驱逐舰上出现了疫情，目前已有18例新冠病毒感染病例。据报道，该舰上大约有350名人员，最近被派往加入加勒比/东太平洋海域打击非法毒品贩运的行动。五角大楼发言人乔纳森·霍夫曼称，第一名船员出现症状后被带 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEUmjajnN" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497497672457791:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497497672457791&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%8589%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠病毒感染病例超89万#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%B7%B2%E8%B6%855%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国死亡病例已超5万例#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学新冠肺炎疫情实时监测系统显示，截至美东时间24日下午5时31分，美国共有新冠病毒感染病例890524例，其中包括死亡病例51017例。与该系统约24小时前的数据相比，美国新增感染病例26109例，新增死亡病例3125例。<br>美国 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEU8mcFzE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497489023019750:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497489023019750&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4497488054729065" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEU6NjQff?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-25 06:42" date="1587768173000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497488054729065:fromprofile"> 2020-4-25 06:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%8519%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利累计确诊超19万例#</a>】根据意大利民事保护部门公布的最近数据，截至当地时间4月24日18时，意大利现有新冠肺炎确诊病例106527例，死亡25969例，治愈60498例，累计确诊病例192994例，较4月23日18时新增确诊3021例，新增420例死亡病例。（韩硕） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <ul>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IERo0b22o&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frmrb&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609498613&amp;ssig=llj7q8SAtR" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497383402629444" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IERo0b22o?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 23:47" date="1587743223000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497383402629444:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 23:47</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%EF%BC%8C%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#你好，明天#</a>】今天是第五个中国航天日。50年前，“东方红一号”卫星成功发射；今天，中国首次火星探测任务名称公布。抚今追昔，感慨良多。从嫦娥一号到天宫一号，从“胖五”到“火星我们来了”……筚路蓝缕，寻梦苍穹，中华民族是追“星”族。敢向苍天问，中国人探索太空的脚步将迈得更稳更远！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5867700108&amp;cid=4497385139364661&amp;nick=最纯粹的笑&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-24 23:53</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497378700390018" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IERgq1DsC?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 23:28" date="1587742102000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497378700390018:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 23:28</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%9B%E9%98%9F%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E7%BB%84%E6%8A%B5%E8%BE%BE%E5%B7%B4%E5%9F%BA%E6%96%AF%E5%9D%A6%23&amp;from=default">#军队抗疫专家组抵达巴基斯坦#</a>】中国军队抗疫专家组24日搭乘空军运输机飞抵巴基斯坦首都伊斯兰堡，随机抵达的还有中方援助的一批核酸检测试剂盒、防护服等疫情防控物资。巴基斯坦参联会主席纳迪姆·拉扎和中国驻巴基斯坦大使姚敬到机场迎接。（人民日报记者丁雪真） ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5321290755&amp;cid=4497379271415400&amp;nick=王先森的小哈哈&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-24 23:30</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#人民直播#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E5%B0%8F%E7%8F%A0%E5%B1%B1%E6%A3%AE%E6%9E%97%E7%81%AB%E7%81%BE%E5%A4%8D%E7%87%83%E6%95%91%E6%8F%B4%23&amp;from=default">#青岛小珠山森林火灾复燃救援#</a>】4月23日，青岛黄岛区小珠山大溪谷发生一起森林火灾，青岛迅速安排组织扑救，24日，现场明火被全部扑灭。但因期间高山阵风风力陡增，下午太平庵高峰处发生复燃，目前山火仍在扑救。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 联动<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%96%B0%E4%BA%AC%E6%8A%A5%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=新京报我们视频">@新京报我们视频</a> 直击救援现场！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497375235962935:1034-video:1034%3A4497387272732674:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497375235962935:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wgDacI" alt="http://t.cn/A6wgDacI" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497372187221653" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IER5UuiGh?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 23:02" date="1587740548000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497372187221653:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 23:02</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E4%BB%8E%E8%BF%91%E4%B8%87%E9%99%8D%E8%87%B3%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#武汉重症病例从近万降至清零#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E8%BD%AC%E5%8D%B1%E4%B8%BA%E5%AE%89%E7%9A%84%E7%9E%AC%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#武汉重症患者转危为安的瞬间#</a>】4月24日，武汉最后一例新冠重症患者治愈，实现清零。从2月中旬重症患者最高峰时的近1万例，到4月10日下降至两位数，再到24日清零，武汉市、湖北省乃至全国付出了艰苦努力。一起回顾一个个患者与死神搏斗后的动人瞬间。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IER5UuiGh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497372187221653:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497372187221653&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                <a name="4497366768311096" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEQXayS5W?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 22:40" date="1587739257000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497366768311096:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 22:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【向星辰大海出发！9图了解中国火星探测任务】24日，中国首次火星探测任务名称、任务标识公布。行星探测任务被命名为“天问系列”，首次火星探测任务被命名为“天问一号”。据了解，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%A9%E9%97%AE%E4%B8%80%E5%8F%B7%E7%81%AB%E6%98%9F%E6%8E%A2%E6%B5%8B%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E4%BB%8A%E5%B9%B4%E5%AE%9E%E6%96%BD%23&amp;from=default">#天问一号火星探测任务今年实施#</a>。为什么叫“天问一号”？<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E7%81%AB%E6%98%9F%E6%8E%A2%E6%B5%8B%E8%A6%81%E6%8E%A2%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%23&amp;from=default">#我国首次火星探测要探什么#</a>？戳图了解↓转发期待！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609498623&amp;ssig=LKfw9Z8Y8e" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497357858977279" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEQINBFoP?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 22:05" date="1587737132000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497357858977279:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 22:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【夜读：与其熬夜，不如早起】“早起三光，迟起三慌”，一个人的作息时间，往往能体现一个人的精神状态与人生态度。早起和不早起的人生真的不一样。早起的人，往往有更多时间去规划、安排自己的时间和生活，也能更好地面对现在和未来。让我们从早睡早起开始，给自己的生活一个改变吧！&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEQINBFoP" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497357858977279:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497357858977279&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497343267223099" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEQlguj3B?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 21:07" date="1587733654000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497343267223099:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 21:07</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/19DcdW" rel="nofollow">微博视频</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>
        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">
            <ul>

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609498623&amp;ssig=LKfw9Z8Y8e" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497340813258171" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEQhjdFB9?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 20:57" date="1587733069000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497340813258171:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 20:57</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E5%B0%8F%E7%8F%A0%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%A4%E5%A4%84%E5%B1%B1%E7%81%AB%E5%A4%8D%E7%87%83%23&amp;from=default">#山东青岛小珠山两处山火复燃#</a> 山地陡峭只能靠直升机取水灭火】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%BB%84%E5%B2%9B%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=黄岛发布">@黄岛发布</a>，24日中午，山东青岛小珠山山林火情一高峰处发生复燃，因山势陡峭，人员很难上去，只能依靠直升机取水灭火。截至24日13时，当地正采取措施对2处着火点全力扑救。愿平安，转发关注！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497340813258171:1034-video:1034%3A4497270322692117:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497340813258171:2803301701" title="青蕉视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wd3wIq" alt="http://t.cn/A6wd3wIq" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>青蕉视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IEPTDwBB3&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609498623&amp;ssig=LKfw9Z8Y8e" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#四川高校开学时间#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A15%E6%9C%886%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E5%8F%AF%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#四川高校5月6日起可返校开学#</a>】4月24日，四川省教育厅发布了《关于高等学校2020年春季学期开学有关事项的通知》（以下简称《通知》），对全省高等学校2020年春季学期开学作出安排部署。《通知》明确，5月6日起，各高校可根据生源特点、学生规模、疫情防控条件等情况，安排学生 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEPT2yxVR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497325768233591:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497325768233591&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497323864841318" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEPPYkjrM?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 19:50" date="1587729028000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497323864841318:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 19:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF%E9%A6%96%E5%AE%97%E4%BE%AE%E8%BE%B1%E5%9B%BD%E6%97%97%E6%A1%88%E8%A2%AB%E5%91%8A%E8%8E%B7%E5%88%9120%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#香港首宗侮辱国旗案被告获刑20天#</a>】香港一名21岁男子2019年因侮辱国旗，原本被判200小时社会服务令，香港特区政府律政司申请刑期复核。香港高等法院上诉庭24日表示，被告侮辱国旗行为恶劣，改判被告监禁20日。这是香港首宗侮辱国旗被判刑案件。律政司在申请上诉时表示，原审裁判官在判刑时低估案件 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEPPYkjrM" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497323864841318:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497323864841318&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%B8%82%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BB%8A%E5%B9%B4%E9%A6%96%E4%B8%AA%E6%B2%99%E5%B0%98%E8%93%9D%E8%89%B2%E9%A2%84%E8%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#北京市发布今年首个沙尘蓝色预警#</a>】北京市气象台4月24日18时35分发布沙尘蓝色预警信号：预计当前至24日夜间，北京市大部分地区有沙尘天气。根据北京环保监测中心，今天中午前后在浑善达克沙地出现沙尘，并随西北气流迅速向东南发展扩大，大约16时30分，沙尘前锋已进入北京上空。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEPDFjwHs" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497316234653934:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497316234653934&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【最新：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E4%BA%BA%E6%95%B0%E8%B6%85268%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全球感染人数超268万例#</a>】截至北京时间4月24日16时，211个国家和地区累计确诊2679653例，“钻石公主”号邮轮712例，全球累计死亡190781例。其中，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E869172%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠肺炎869172例#</a>。转发关注<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E8%B5%B0%E5%8A%BF%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎疫情全球走势#</a>↓↓ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【13年来首次修改！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%AA%81%E5%8F%91%E4%BA%8B%E4%BB%B6%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E6%B3%95%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E5%90%AF%E5%8A%A8%23&amp;from=default">#突发事件应对法修改工作启动#</a>】全国人大日前正式启动了《中华人民共和国突发事件应对法》的修改工作。现行的突发事件应对法是2007年8月由十届全国人大常委会第二十九次会议通过的，并于当年11月1日施行。本次修改，也是该法实施13年以来的首次修改。<a title="【独家】突发事件应对法修改工作启动" href="http://t.cn/A6wgLrHf" alt="http://t.cn/A6wgLrHf" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>【独家】突发事件应对法修改工作启动</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497295376491562" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEP61reKC?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 17:57" date="1587722236000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497295376491562:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 17:57</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%88%96%E8%BF%BD%E6%BA%AF%E8%87%B312%E6%9C%88%23&amp;from=default">#美疫情或追溯至12月#</a>：死者没来过中国】当地时间21日，美国加利福尼亚州圣克拉拉县卫生部门官员透露，近日验尸官们解剖了三具遗体，这三人生前皆出现过流感样症状，分别于2月6日、2月17日、3月6日在家中死亡，解剖发现这三名死者均感染了新冠病毒。《华盛顿邮报》引述当地卫生负责人的表态报道说， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEP61reKC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497295376491562:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497295376491562&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%89%E6%9E%97%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#吉林高校开学时间#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%89%E6%9E%97%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A15%E6%9C%8811%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E5%A4%8D%E8%AF%BE%23&amp;from=default">#吉林高校5月11日起首批复课#</a>】24日，吉林省教育厅发布《关于做好2020年春季学期全省高校开学工作的通知》：各高校在全面做好疫情防控和开学准备的前提下，5月11日起可开展2020年春季学期首批开学复课工作。首批开学对象为确有返校实际需求的毕业年级学生和有重要科研任务的研究生 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEOLjfCNC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497282533724068:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497282533724068&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E4%BA%94%E4%B8%80%E6%9C%9F%E9%97%B4%E5%85%AC%E5%9B%AD%E6%99%AF%E5%8C%BA%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E9%99%90%E6%B5%81%23&amp;from=default">#北京五一期间公园景区要求限流#</a>】4月24日，北京市委宣传部副部长徐和建表示，五一假期将近，广大市民要按照商超公园景区的防疫要求，普及应用北京健康宝，主动配合预约制、入口测温、限流分流、一米线等防控措施，不扎堆，不聚集。此外，还要求精准做好社区防控，严格执行小区村封闭式管理，坚持开 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEOCHj7rx" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497277194556847:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497277194556847&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【打击网络恶意营销账号！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E7%BD%91%E4%BF%A1%E5%8A%9E%E5%85%B3%E5%81%9C%E8%B4%A6%E5%8F%B718576%E4%B8%AA%23&amp;from=default">#国家网信办关停账号18576个#</a>】今年3月以来，多个网络账号炒作“疫情之下的某国：店铺关门歇业，华商太难了”“多国渴望回归中国”“钟南山：5月疫情将全面爆发”等“标题党”文章，散布虚假信息，造成极为恶劣的社会影响。针对这些问题，国家网信办有关负责人表示，部分网络 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEOxT87QT" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497274211936811:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497274211936811&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%93%AC%E4%BD%A9%E5%A5%A5%E5%A8%81%E8%83%81%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E6%9B%B4%E6%8D%A2%E5%85%B6%E8%B4%9F%E8%B4%A3%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#蓬佩奥威胁世卫组织更换其负责人#</a> 耿爽：典型霸权心态！】在4月24日的外交部例行记者会上，有记者提问：22日美国国务卿蓬佩奥称，世卫组织需进行结构性调整，改正其缺陷。美国不排除要求更换世卫组织负责人，甚至可能自此不再向世卫组织提供资金。请问中方对此有何评论？<br>“美方对世卫组织的攻击、 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEOlLFS6b" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497266699979407:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497266699979407&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                    <li class=" curr">
                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4497266699979407"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>992</em></span></span></span></a>

                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609498630&amp;ssig=6dK6HujdDt" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497263932073644" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEOhj8HrS?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 15:52" date="1587714738000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497263932073644:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 15:52</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【走失13年，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%81%8B%E5%93%91%E5%84%BF%E9%9D%A0%E4%B8%80%E9%A6%96%E7%AB%A5%E8%B0%A3%E6%89%BE%E5%88%B0%E5%AE%B6%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#聋哑儿靠一首童谣找到家人#</a>】2007年，11岁聋哑儿孙兆亮与父亲走失，被陌生人扔了后靠乞讨生活。所幸他一直记得父亲教过的一句童谣“我爱家乡、我爱盱眙”。这些年他不断打听“盱眙”，直到有人告诉他江苏淮安有个盱眙县，并帮他写了求助信，随后他一路乞讨回到了家乡。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEOhj8HrS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497263932073644:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497263932073644&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%89%E6%9E%97%E7%9C%81%E4%B8%AD%E8%80%83%E6%94%B9%E4%B8%BA7%E6%9C%8827%E6%97%A5%E8%87%B330%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#吉林省中考改为7月27日至30日#</a>】4月24日，吉林省教育考试院发布公告，调整吉林省部分教育考试安排。其中中考考试时间为7月27日—30日。因受疫情影响，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%89%E6%9E%97%E6%9A%82%E5%81%9C%E4%B8%AD%E8%80%83%E4%BD%93%E8%82%B2%E7%8E%B0%E5%9C%BA%E8%80%83%E8%AF%95%23&amp;from=default">#吉林暂停中考体育现场考试#</a>。各地可根据本地实际,自行制定计入中考总分的体育考试框架及赋分办法。 <a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6wdQ3Cs" alt="http://t.cn/A6wdQ3Cs" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6993438403" usercard="id=6993438403">_橘子熊</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B1%82%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E5%8F%96%E6%B6%88%E4%BD%93%E8%80%83%23&amp;from=default">#求广东取消体考#</a> ‼️<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81%E5%8F%96%E6%B6%88%E4%BD%93%E8%82%B2%E4%B8%AD%E8%80%83%23&amp;from=default">#支持取消体育中考#</a> 作为广东的一名学生，我想请求广东取消体育中考。理由如下：疫情期间中考生居家锻炼场地有限，大多数人体能下降，开学后又要戴着口罩迅速恢复高强度的体育训练以备体育中考，身体吃不消的同时更容易对学生的身体造成伤害，反而违背了体育中考的初衷‼️        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【今天<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%AE%9E%E7%8E%B0%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#武汉重症病例实现清零#</a>】4月24日，国家卫生健康委宣传司新闻发言人、副司长米锋表示，刚刚得到消息，随着最后1例重症患者新冠肺炎治愈，今天武汉重症病例实现清零。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497253420599908:1042163-video:1042163%3A4497253713510414:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497253420599908:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wdWduy" alt="http://t.cn/A6wdWduy" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4497250858041110" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IENWdxJRk?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 15:00" date="1587711622000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497250858041110:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 15:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#人民直播#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】国务院联防联控机制定于4月24日15时召开新闻发布会，介绍加强农村贫困人口帮扶工作情况，国务院扶贫办有关司局负责人回答媒体提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 现场直播，共同关注！<br> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497250858041110:1034-video:1034%3A4497264178036745:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497250858041110:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wd0TlF" alt="http://t.cn/A6wd0TlF" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                        <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IENZMAZGY&amp;type=2&amp;url=&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=6', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a></span></li>

                    <!-- 删除 -->

                    <!-- 回复 -->

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>

                                                                                                                        【转给TA！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%8E%E5%A4%A9%E6%99%9A%E4%B8%8A%E7%9C%8B%E5%8F%8C%E6%98%9F%E6%8A%B1%E6%9C%88%23&amp;from=default">#后天晚上看双星抱月#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】据天文专家介绍，如果天气晴好，4月26日晚，我国公众将欣赏到<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8F%8C%E6%98%9F%E6%8A%B1%E6%9C%88%23&amp;from=default">#双星抱月#</a>这一奇特天文现象。26日日落后不久，金星悬挂在西北方天空，在金星下方不远处，有一颗橙红色的星星，这是恒星毕宿五。晚8时左右，一弯蛾眉月将停在金星和毕宿五之间，形成“双星抱月”的奇特 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IENJNc4Df" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497243152877745:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497243152877745&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497234563695473" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IENvWfvmp?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 13:55" date="1587707736000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497234563695473:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 13:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【民政部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B4%AB%E5%9B%B0%E6%88%B7%E6%82%A3%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%E8%8E%B71%E4%B8%87%E6%95%91%E5%8A%A9%E9%87%91%23&amp;from=default">#贫困户患新冠肺炎最高获1万救助金#</a>】24日，民政部新闻发言人贾维周表示，今年以来各地已向低保对象、特困人员等困难群众发放价格临时补贴资金37.1亿元，惠及8168.9万人次。湖北省对城乡低保人员、特困人员等特殊困难群体按照城市人员不低于500元、农村人员不低于300元标准，给予生活物资救 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IENvWfvmp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497234563695473:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497234563695473&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <li class="WB_pic li_9 S_bg1 S_line2 bigcursor " action-data="isGoldenV=0&amp;isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;pic_id=a716fd45ly1ge4sl0fufjj20p02fsafs" action-type="fl_pics" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_newimage_feed&amp;value=image_feed_unfold:4497227781198969:a716fd45ly1ge4sl0fufjj20p02fsafs:2803301701:0">

                            </li>
            </ul>
                    </div>
    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                                                                                                             【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%99%95%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E7%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&from=default\">#陕西新增7例境外输入病例#<\/a>（其中1例为无症状感染者转为确诊病例）。当前隔离密切接触者160人。新增7例境外输入新冠肺炎确诊病例、1例无症状感染者，与4月21日、22日公布的23例境外输入确诊病例属同一航班人员，于4月19日乘坐CA910航班由                                                                                                              【一起加油！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E5%90%AF%E5%8A%A8%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E5%90%88%E4%BD%9C%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE%E5%8A%A0%E5%BF%AB%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E7%A0%94%E5%8F%91%23&from=default\">#世卫组织启动国际合作项目加快疫苗研发#<\/a>】当地时间4月24日，世界卫生组织总干事谭德塞宣布，启动“获得抗击新冠肺炎工具加速器”国际合作倡议，加速新冠肺炎疫苗、诊断和治疗工具的研发、生产和公平分配。“只有团结一致，才能遏制疫情，确保科学和研究成果惠及每一个人。”（张朋辉） class=\"PCD_user_b S_bg1\" node-type=\"follow_recommend_box\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"人民日报\">\n                                                                                                                        【华春莹发推：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%B7%B2%E5%90%91%E7%BE%8E%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E8%B6%8524%E4%BA%BF%E4%B8%AA%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&from=default\">#中国已向美提供超24亿个口罩#<\/a>，够每个美国人分7个】4月23日，外交部发言人华春莹发推特称：截至4月20日，中国已向美国提供了超过24.6亿个口罩，这意味着每个美国人能分到7个口罩。此外，（中国）还提供了近5000台呼吸机和很多其他设备。华春莹表示，“希望这能拯救更多生命”。                                                【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"
